name: Tower Crawler
description:
Tower Crawler is a game where you play as a worm who needs to escape before the saw squashes them! While escaping you need to grow into a big worm to win each of the levels. Good Luck!

This game was made for Spring 2D Jam 2021 

Controls:

Move - WASD

Credits:
